title: IWC's Hacking Lab based off Kali Linux
description:
This is a bootable USB image.  Read the readme file.

This is a hacking lab environment based off kali Linux with a ton of extras installed.

Virtualbox is set up and running with Metasploitable 2 ready to hack
veil evasion framework
OpenVas added, installed, and setup
skype is running
If your audio card is supported, xmbc - Kodi is installed.
a Bunch more has been added, but this is the base lab.  Other "modules" are added with training.  You can customize this yourself for your own lab.


build for Cobalt strike install, but it was removed due to export laws

type in "powerup" in the command line to update the system, openvas, and clamav definitions

type in "cleanme" in the command line to clear history and run bleachbit

Team viewer is istalled.  UNINSTALL it.  You can reinstall it on your own, but it calls back home for paid training support.  in the command line, just type "apt purge teamviewer" unless you want to buy training from them.

To install
64GB or larger USB IS REQUIRED!!!

extract the .001 file
boot into Linux or use an image to disk utility in windows.
In Linux: fdisk -l to identify your blank USB.  Assuming it is sdb

          dcfldd if=IWC-Hacking-Lab-v.09.001 of=/dev/sdb

Then reboot and use the USB persistence option.  Then you're in
